item.title: TimelineRS
item.description: TimelineRS is a simple timeline creation app written in Rust. It uses egui and eframe for native and web builds with web assembly. Check it out here: TimelineRS Source Code

item.title: Music
item.description: Sometimes I record synthesizer jams and upload them to SoundCloud, YouTube or Bandcamp. Juxtaposition by Mike Eder Twosyn by Mike Eder Gerp9 by Mike Eder
